recommendation: Select the region(s) to use and block the rest
guidance:
- Have you identified the AWS regions your organization is authorized to use and documented them as part of your security policy?
- Is there an SCP (Service Control Policy) in place at the Organizations level to deny the creation of resources in unauthorized regions?
- If using AWS Control Tower, is the Region Deny guardrail enabled to ensure that even newly created accounts inherit the region restriction automatically?
how_to_check: [Organizations] Verify that an SCP with a region-based deny condition (aws:RequestedRegion) is attached at the root or OU level in AWS Organizations | If using Control Tower, confirm that the 'Disallow Changes to Region Configuration' and region deny guardrails are enabled and applied to all enrolled accounts
